GMCM.ToggleHotkey.Desc: This is the toggle hotkey for Auto-Scythe.
GMCM.AutoSwitch.Desc: Automatically switch to the scythe when approaching interactable objects. The scythe must be in the toolbar.
GMCM.EffectOnMarkNodes.Desc: Right-click while holding a scythe to mark a target for harvesting.
GMCM.EffectOnMatureCrops.Desc: Include mature crops as harvest targets.
GMCM.EffectOnDeadCrops.Desc: Includes dead crops as clearing targets.
GMCM.EffectOnForage.Desc: Include wild forage items as harvest targets.
GMCM.EffectOnMossOnTree.Desc: Include moss on trees as harvest targets.
GMCM.EffectOnMossOnFruitTree.Desc: Include fruit tree fruits as harvest targets.
GMCM.EffectOnBushForage.Desc: Include bush forage fruits as harvest targets.
GMCM.EffectOnGreenRainBush.Desc: Include Green Rain Bush as harvest targets.
GMCM.IgnoreFlowers.Desc: Ignore harvesting flowers to prevent interfering with beehouse production.
GMCM.MarkHotkey.Desc: Press to mark/unmark the nearest eligible tile.
